Action.author: mgbailey
Action.body: 3 of the 5 external stewards have restarted the service on their node, and we have consensus again. I am lowering the priority on this ticket.

Action.author: mgbailey
Action.body: ~Derashe The logs on the nodes themselves are corrupt. The corruption is only during the time frame of concern, and the newer logs are fine. I think we will just need to close this ticket out.
